Very good and nicely made. It has a beautiful user interface and provides gorgeous wallpaper. Only flaws are the constant crashes and slow load speed; other than that, it's great.
Great collection.. i love it but it doesn't download any wallpapers ..i tried everything after downloading 2 wallpaper it doesn't download and it freezes.

Very good image quality, but experiencing problem on galaxy S5. It crashes very often while scrolling through photos and most of the times it wont download image, it loads for a very long time and at the end happens nothing. Please fix this :)
Need improvement the app is getting crash

App is mostly good for looking through photos from Unsplash, but does have some issues. There doesn't seem to be a way to add a photo to my own collection, and app crashes every time I go to my own profile.
